fields.summary: JIRA Issues Macro no longer has sort or pagination functionality

fields.description:
When i want to add a label to a page, for some pages auto-complete is not working. The request to autocompletelabel.action is not returning any result. For pages having this problem, the content by label macro will also not work. That means these pages are not list in the content by label macro.
But searching these pages by labelText:labelname works as expected.
Rebuilding the search index didn't have any effect.
fields.summary: Labels not working sometimes

fields.description:
Some warnings are appearing in Confluence log:

{code}
2013-02-12 20:43:31,590 WARN [http-8686-68] [atlassian.plugin.webresource.DefaultResourceDependencyResolver] resolveDependencies Cannot find web resource module for: com.atlassian.analytics.analytics-client:js-events
 -- url: /plugins/servlet/notifications-miniview | userName: xxxx | referer: http://confluence/display/RFPF/Errors+and+Warnings
{code}

Basically this bug is related to this [CONF-25603|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-25603], but we see now this same warning in Confluence 4.3.6 and 4.3.7.

*Workaround*

This message does not typically indicate an actual problem with the system. You can hide it by going to "Logging & Profiling" under the Administration settings, and adding a configuration for:

* {{com.atlassian.plugin.webresource}} – level ERROR.

This will hide all "WARN" level messages from this area of the system.
fields.summary: Too many warnings in log: "Cannot find web resource module for: …"

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29984].
  {panel}

* Steps:
**  Create a page ('MyPage') containing a "JIRA Issue" macro, rerferring to JIRA issue 'XX-YY'.
**  In another page ('OtherPage'), search for the JIRA issue key ('XX-YY')
*** in the top-right sdearch bar, or
*** in the top-left search bar of the Documentation Theme
* Current behavior: the search does not return 'MyPage'
* Expected result:the search returns 'MyPage'
fields.summary: Confluence search bars do not find issues from "JIRA Issue"
Links broken

fields.description:
h4.Steps to Reproduce:
This bug can be reproduced in IE9, IE10, and Firefox 22. 
# Create Page, with a character ((), !, #, -. =, or anything else) in the page title
# Add a few paragraph to the page, with heading
# Use TOC macro
# Save the page

h4.Expected Results:
You should be able to go to the top of the paragraph if you click on the link of the paragraph created by TOC macro. 
 
h4.Actual Results:
TOC links do not work at all.

 h4.Findings:
I have tested this on Confluence 5.1.2, and I was not able to reproduce it. It works fine.
fields.summary: TOC links do not work when there is a character in page title

fields.description:
*Steps to Reproduce*
# Create a table with 3 columns
# Merge the header of the first 2
# Put pointer in the first column
# Click "Insert column before" button

!Screenshot1.png!

*Actual Result*
Column gets added but header is also part of 2 merged cells.
!Screenshot2.png!

*Expected Result*
Column gets added apart from the 2 merged cells.
!Screenshot3.png!
fields.summary: Adding a column to a merged cell adds column as merged
Users cant see Watchers anymore

fields.description:
The text entered in Multi-Line variable from the user created template will not be displayed in a page.

h3. Step to Reproduce
# Go to Confluence Admin >> Global Template >> Add new template.
# Create a multiline variable then save the template
!example.png!
# Create a page using that template
# Type some text inside the variable then save
!example1.png!
# The newly created page will not contain the text entered in the variable. This only occur with Multi-lIne Text Variable.

(Please take note that this bug does not occur in Confluence 4.3.7)
fields.summary: Text Input in Multi-Line Text Variable from Template is not displayed after the page is Created.

fields.description:
When my current user profile setting for language is english and i click on the "Configure Sidebar" link, the buttons  in the sidebar configuration are displayed in german "Fertig" and "Verknüpfung hinzufügen". After i click on "Fertig", the "Configure Sidebar" link is displayed also in german "Randleiste Konfigurieren". 
The problem remained, after i changed my preferred browser language to English.
fields.summary: Configure Sidebar doesn't respect language settings
Ability to customize stop-words to Lucene in Confluence

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29974].
  {panel}

I ran into this issue when I was trying to update the stylesheet in the JIRA space. Please see the attached screenshots and you will see the problem: the Help Tip is persistent and cannot be dismissed. This means that that amount of space available to edit the style sheet is very narrow.

Can we add something to this Help Tip to make it dismissable? I couldn't find a way to get rid of it.

Thanks,
Susan
fields.summary: Help Tip taking up valuable screen real estate in the Confluence Editor

fields.description:
Some users have reported having to log in to Confluence Mobile very frequently, while others report rarely having to, with the login details remembered over long periods of time (remember me cookie should be fore 2 weeks).

We should investigate what the cause of frequent log outs is for some users.
fields.summary: Mobile users report having to constantly log in
Extractors not called when page created in 5.2-beta1

fields.description: Using both of the files attached in this report, the one that contains a number on the slide doesn't render in office powerpoint viewfile macro while the other does render and it's very similar.
fields.summary: Powerpoint slide with a number inside the slide doesn't render

fields.description:
When the Note macro is wrapped in a User Macro.. Output when wrapped in a user macro

a big note

Output when not wrapped (notice an actual closing span to close the icon span)

a big note
fields.summary: Note Macro renders incorrect html for message icon when wrapped in a user macro
Ability to Set Usergroup to Watch a Page
Improve the error message when trying to move restricted pages
impossible to rename space in the 5.2-OD-3 version
Update view all macros to include the "Jira Issue" (single) macro

fields.description: When a link to an attachment is included in a Page Properties table, the link is grayed out and doesn't work on the Page Properties Report macro (see attached screenshot).
fields.summary: Attachment links are broken in Page Properties Report macro

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29961].
  {panel}

We use our Confluence wiki for internal communication and to work with our customers in specific projects.

After the last upgrade to Confluence 5.1.4 we received several emails from our customers that the get a warning/error from our mail server after they shared a page or used an @mention.

This is true cause our Mailserver does not allow relaying for other mail domains!

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_mail_relay

So we actually have 2 options:

1) deactivate @mentions completly
2) to live on with this mailserver warning/errors.

But number 2 isn't quite an option.

It would be best if we could limit this feature to a specific group of people.

Kind Regards
René

P.S. The same goes for "share pages"
fields.summary: Limit @mentions and share feature to specific groups

fields.description:
* Steps:
** Create a 'square list' (with the dash key)
** Copy and paste it (on the same page)
* Expected behavior: the copied list is a square list.
* Current behavior: the copied list becomes a circle list (the default Confluence list)
fields.summary: Squared lists converted into Circled lists
Documentation request: Bookmarking plugin
After deactivating the sidebar plugin, the Confluence log is filled with error messages
Tree refreshes into a collapsed state after each page load
the workday menu item in the header should not be displayed if in-app notification is disabled in the admin screen

fields.description:
Plugin version: confluence-editor-hide-tools-1.0.18.jar

This issue could be reproduced on Chrome on Windows only. The issue could not be reproduced on Chrome for Mac.

h4. Steps to reproduce
# Create a page with the distraction free editor (dfe) engaged
# Save the page
# Edit the page (dfe should be automatically engaged)
# Try scrolling via the mousewheel

The page will scroll but the primary toolbar will not stalk, leaving the user without a primary toolbar unless they scroll to the top of the page.

A side effect of this is that at the bottom of the page there is a grey area at the bottom of the page which is covered by the bottom toolbar when it is triggered (see screenshot)
fields.summary: primary toolbar doesn't stalk when distraction free editor is engaged on Chrome/Windows

fields.description:
Plugin version: confluence-editor-hide-tools-1.0.18.jar

h4. Steps to reproduce
# as User A, engage distraction free editor (dfe) i nthe editor
# as User B, start editing the same page
# as User A, trigger the merge conflict screen with the dfe engaged

The diff information will get hidden/swallowed by the title bar and the primary toolbar will get pushed to the bottom

Reproduced on Chrome
Workaround: press Esc - it will bring back the diffs
fields.summary: diffs on merge conflict screen get hidden by the distraction free editor
Pagetree macro's "Expand All" link is cut off

fields.description:
h3.Problem
New Code macro doesn't seem to be working as the documentation explains. It does not have the icons to perform actions such print the code and display as text. 

The macro doesn't display the icons in the left side of it:
!newcode1.png!

Per the documentation, it should be working:

!newcode2.png!
fields.summary: NEW Macro Code does not Work as Expected from Documentation

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29946].
  {panel}

Please add the database that are supported the document: http://docs.appdynamics.com/display/ADDB/Introduction+to+AppDynamics+for+Databases 

While the database are shown in the images they don't specify specifics on what is and is not supported. Please see email from Ian McGuinness (from AppDynamics) 

The supported database platforms are:
 
1.       IBM DB2 LUW

2.       MySQL

3.       SQL Server

4.       Sybase ASE

5.       Sybase IQ

6.       Oracle

7.       PostgreSQL

 
You can assume we support all versions of these databases, running on any hardware/os platform.
fields.summary: Update documentation for AppDynamics for Databases

fields.description: When creating a wiki page I attached 50+ images and they all attached successfully.  The following day when looking at the page I noticed that instead of the attached images a red x now appears for about 10 of them.  Additionally when attempting to attached a new image after this it would let me select the image with browse but the "insert" button remained grayed out.  Only a few of the thumbnails of the images ever loaded in this view as well, even after leaving it to "load" for a couple of hours.
fields.summary: Images attach but do not display.

fields.description:
h3. Steps to reproduce:

# Attach a .mp4/.wmv file in a Confluence page
# Using the Multimedia Macro, add the video.
# Save the page, and try to visualize.
# You'll prompt get an authentication screen.

h3. Workaround:

# Can't replicate on Windows 8 using IE10.
# Fill up with your credentials.
fields.summary: Multimedia Macro asks for NTLM authentication.

fields.description:
After updating to confluence 5.1.4 (yesterday) i found the TOC-macro is not working as expected: it creates the table of contents defined by the level of the headlines fine. But clicking on the links it creates does not jump to the chapter in the page, when certain characters are in the headline. So far I found out that these characters don't work:
German characters: ä,ö,ü,ß 
But also quite normal ones: "", :, , (comma)

Strange, that did work with confluence 4.2. We use the german localized version of confluence on the same linux server (cent-os) as before with version 4.2
fields.summary: TOC Macro does not work with certain characters in headline (FF, IE9, IE10)
Copy/Paste of Images does not work in IE11
Set Horizontal Rule Default When Creating Headings

fields.description:
We connected Confluence to our AD.
 We have an employee that has the character [http://decodeunicode.org/en/u+0107|http://decodeunicode.org/en/u+0107/properties] in his name.
 Confluence doesn't sync his name correctly.
 In JIRA - which is connected to the same AD - his name is shown correctly.
 But in Confluence only a question mark is shown.
 It seems to me this is a synchronization time problem and not a display problem as the cwd_user table in the confluence database also only has the question mark in it.
 In the JIRA DB, the name is correctly without question mark.
fields.summary: LDAP Synchronization with AD doesn't handle special characters correctly

fields.description:
Pasting an Image into the editor is working with firefox, but after saving the page, the image is not displayed (only an error message).

Pasting with internet explorer is not working at all. Nothing happens.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29938].
  {panel}

Occasionally and very difficult to reproduce, when resuming a draft, it cannot be saved again. Log shows:

{noformat}
org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateSystemException: identifier of an instance of com.atlassian.confluence.pages.Draft altered from 18448406 to 18448405;
nested exception is net.sf.hibernate.HibernateException: identifier of an instance of com.atlassian.confluence.pages.Draft altered from 18448406 to 18448405

        at org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.proceed(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:171)
        at org.springframework.aop.framework.JdkDynamicAopProxy.invoke(JdkDynamicAopProxy.java:204)
        at com.sun.proxy.$Proxy108.saveDraftFromEditor(Unknown Source)
{noformat}
fields.summary: Sometimes cannot save drafts

fields.description:
Steps:
- Add/edit page
- Make quick edit
- Click save

The spinning icon appears and Save/Cancel are disabled, but nothing happens.

However, Save works fine if either of these occur:
a) reload page before editing
b) resume draft

Confirmed across multiple versions of Chrome, Safari and Firefox.
fields.summary: Cannot save on first page load

fields.description:
Hi,

It seems that this is a bug of Firefox [WebDAV Launcher|https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/webdav-launcher/] addon. IE works fine.
Perhaps the addon may not support the filename/url including multi-byte characters.

Below is the testing results:
|| Filename || IE || Firefox ||
| ブック.xlsx | (/) | (x) |
| Book1.xlsx | (/) | (/) |

Best regards,
Kan Ogawa
fields.summary: Cannot open office document if the filename contains multi-byte characters.
Improve information available on Licensing Details page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29934].
  {panel}

*Background of The Request*

Confluence administrators currently need to access each and every space administrators page in order to modify space permissions. When a wide permission changes necessary due to company policy or other cause, Confluence administrators need to perform the daunting task of accessing each space administrators especially if the instance is huge.

*Possible Implementation*

Introduce a "Space Permission Menu" on Confluence administrators section where a drop down list of all spaces available. So when administrators select the space on the drop down list, the permission will refresh itself for the admin to configure.
fields.summary: Introduce a Centralized Space Permission Menu for All Spaces
Provide ability to globally change the stylesheet for non-default themes

fields.description:
I have very long report (417 pages), and after the upgrade to 5.1.4 I cannot get it to display on a page if there are 2 other macros present. It displayed properly in 5.1.2. I will see the other two macros, but the rest of the page is blank.

If I remove just one of the other macros (doesn't matter which one), the content displays.

I was able to get it to work with the other macros on the page by putting the report in an expansion macro, however doing so caused an issue with some values showing up in the wrong column on a handful of pages.

The report also has 14 columns of information, and some of them have long paragraphs of text; since 5.1.4, Confluence resizes all columns to fit on the page (better than what it used to do), but the resulting problem is the vertical alignment is irregular; not all values display in the upper-left corner of the cell. Status macros in a field in particular seem to be placed randomly. 

NOTE: Intentional image blur. I hope you can at least see the part of the display issue, with regard to vertical alignment. As far as making the report disappear, you can try to recreate it thusly:
1) 417 Page Properties Report
2) Change History Macro
3) Child Page Macro
fields.summary: Page Properties Report Display Problems with Large Report

fields.description:
Not sure if you would consider this a JIRA or Confluence bug... perhaps both.

Basically if you create an Issue Collector in JIRA and then use it in Confluence you will get "Your session has expired. You may need to re-submit the form or reload the page." messages for some operations.

I'm not sure what all the operations are that could trigger the error... but here is one way to reproduce:

# Ensure application link is setup between JIRA and Confluence
# Create an Issue Collector in JIRA (trigger style shouldn't matter... but I used Subtle)
# Copy the script for the Issue Collector
# Goto Confluence Administrator
# Navigate to LOOK AND FEEL -> Custom HTML
# Click Edit
# Paste the script for your JIRA Issue Collector into the field for "At end of the HEAD"
# Navigate to a Confluence page
# Under "Tools" click "Watch" or "Stop Watching"
# {color:Red}The error message should be displayed on the page{color}

I have also seen it when I create an issue collector with a custom trigger.  If you create a macro that creates a button which opens the collector (following information here: https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/JIRA/Advanced+Use+of+the+JIRA+Issue+Collector), then any page that uses the macro will give the error when you try to do Edit -> Save.

I have attached a user macro that does the above.  So steps to reproduce:

# Ensure application link is setup between JIRA and Confluence
# Add the issue-collector-button user macro to Confluence.
## You will need to edit the user macro to change "jiraBaseUrl" variable to point to the base url of your JIRA
# Create an Issue Collector in JIRA (trigger style needs to be custom)
# Copy the Issue Collector's ID
# Navigate to a Confluence page
# Edit the page
# Add the issue-collector-button macro to the page (fill in the Collector ID parameter with the Issue Collector ID copied in previous step)
# Save the page
# Click the button and make sure the issue collector opens
# Edit the page
# Save the page
# {color:Red}The error message should be displayed on the page (the page is not saved){color}
# Click the save button a second time
# The page saves without error
fields.summary: Using JIRA Issue Collector in Confluence causes 'Your session has expired' messages.

fields.description:
h3.Problem Page Tree Macro does not work when it is wrapped around a text attribute such as *bold* or _italic_, it renders *Undefined* {code}


{code} h3.Workaround Delete the Macro and create it again, make sure that no attribute has been selected.
fields.summary: When Page Tree Plugin Cannot be encapsulated by any Text Attributes, such as Bold, Italic and more it renders Undefined

fields.description:
When importing a Word document without very much special formatting, the formatting doesn't work and instead of getting separated lines  just get a giant block of text. 

*Steps to reproduce*

 1.    Create a blank page in Confluence 5.1.*
 2.   Tools > Import Word Document and select the word file
 3.   Save the page and see that it loses formatting as the customer stated

*Workaround*
    Create a blank page in Confluence 5.1.*
    Attach the word file to the page
    Use the viewfile macro to display the file to the page, it will honor formatting
fields.summary: Import from Word Formatting Error
Add multiple mentions to 1 task

fields.description: The Confluence is not listing the users in the comment fields or field research.
fields.summary: The Confluence is not listing the users in the comment fields or field research.
Visualization of carriage return characters in page editor
HTML Include : CRLF expected at end of chunk: -1/-1

fields.summary: Incompatibility with Spanish Latin America Language in Chrome shows as 500 Internal Server Error

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29919].
  {panel}

Currently  @mention can only search user through their full name and not their user name.

In this example the user full name is *bla* and his username is *pop*
!example.png!

This user can only be found in @mention through *bla* and not *pop*
fields.summary: Allow @mention to search Username.

fields.description:
With the file list blueprint, the attachment macro is seeing much greater use. When there are a large number of files, the performance of the page is poor.

If we paginated the results, we should have much better performance.

NB: Customers have reported that this issue is compounded in IE. It performs better in Firefox.
fields.summary: Paginate the list of attachments in the attachments macro for file lists

fields.description:
This does not happen every time but has been reported 5 times so far from more than one user. No discernible pattern has yet emerged, making it impossible to predict.

Steps to Reproduce:
A normal user logs into Confluence. 
That user edits an existing document. He then hits Save. 
The page refreshes without throwing any error and without asking the user to log in again. 
All of the user's changes are lost, and the document has no record or trace of the submitted changes. 
Confluence does not register the revision ever happened. 
The user then tries to make changes to the document again. 
This time, when he hits save, the changes are recorded normally and are considered a new revision in the version history.

This problem began immediately after upgrading to 5.1.3, and was not present in previous versions. This is a critical issue for us, as there is no way to predict when it will happen, leading to a lot of lost work and work duplication.
fields.summary: Document Reverts to Previous Version after Hitting Save; All Newer Changes Lost

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29916].
  {panel}

Hello,

I would like the ability for my clients to change their passwords in Confluence. It seems like there's no way to force password change or update once it has been created. As you know it's important to change password often so that the site/users are not prone to hackers or spammers. It's just seems to be a common feature to be able to change password. 

If not added in Confluence maybe have it part of Crowd. Where you point the clients back to Crowd and let them change it. Please give this a consideration when adding new features. Thank you for reading.

Hao Doan
fields.summary: Ability to change password

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29915].
  {panel}

*Steps To Reproduce*
# Watch a page.
# Get Mentioned in a Comment

*Expected Result*
Receive one email that you've been mentioned in a comment.

*Actual Result*
Received both an email that you've been mentioned in a comment AND that the page has been changed.
Check screenshots for example.
fields.summary: Receiving Multiple Notifications for the Same Comment

  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29914].
  {panel}

Improvement request to attachments when creating a page for the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
Create page
In edit mode before having saved page, add attachments
No ability to remove attachment unless page is saved, then edit attachments.

There should be a mechanism to remove an attachment without having to save the page first.

Allow pages/spaces to be favorited by more than 500 users

fields.description:
We recently upgraded our system to 5.1.4 from 4.x and we just realized that the Mail that we previously had in a Space is gone!
The index search still shows the mails, but they hyperlink into nothingness.

We did the upgrade a few weeks ago (when we still had the license) by creating a new confluence installation (auto upgrade did not work) and reimporting the last backup. That seemed to work great, but now we see the Mail is gone.

We also DONT have a "Mail Accounts" option in the Space Administration as documented at (https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Adding+a+Mail+Account). There is thus no way to re-add mails nor to view old mails.

What can we do ?
fields.summary: Mail in Space Missing after Upgrade to 5.1.4

Currently I can not import spaces because the hosted version is 5.2 while the latest standalone is 5.1. The following error message is returned:

Import failed. Check your server logs for more information. com.atlassian.confluence.importexport.ImportExportException: Unable to complete import: Error while importing backup: not-null property references a null or transient value: com.atlassian.confluence.mail.notification.Notification.userName

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29899].
  {panel}

When writing texts using the wiki which might contain issue references, the Wiki page editor automatically creates a hyperlink for issues. 
For example, in the sentence "Save the Instruction Script as ABC-123.txt", the ABC-123.txt becomes a hyperlink to the issue, which is not what should happen.

As the wiki markup {no-link} doesn't work anymore, there is no way to turn automatic links off.

Make to user choose if the link should or not be created by "unlinking" the text.

See related issue: https://support.atlassian.com/browse/JST-33888
fields.summary: Make possible to unlink automatic ondemand links in Wiki pages

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29898].
  {panel}

h3. ***Current Behavior***
If a user imports a personal space using the Confluence OnDemand space importer, that space will become global.

h3. ***Workaround***
 The workaround is to create a new personal space and move the imported content to the new space.

*(!) NOTE: If the user name is the same on the source instance and destination instance you will not be able to create a new personal space on the destination instance as after the import a space with that space key already exists*

If this is the case, follow the documented fix here: https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/How+to+convert+a+global+space+to+a+personal+space+type+in+Confluence

Cloud Customers will need to file a support request at https://support.atlassian.com as the fix requires database access
fields.summary: Confluence Space Importer Converts Personal Spaces to Global on Import
Image gets distorted when selecting image effect.
When exporting to PDF I would like the image effects to be exported as well.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-29892].
  {panel}

Sometimes, I would just like to leave a message to someone with simple message. 
Currently, it is not possible to do that without commenting, mentioning.

For example, 
"Don't forget Mike's B-day tomorrow." 
"Update your profile, it still shows your old phone number."

This is totally different purpose from HipChat.
Not all confluence users use HipChat, and they don't want to use HC.
fields.summary: Allow user to leave a message in notification box.

fields.description: There are some CSS styles missing for the Spaces List macro in the current Confluence version. I attached screenshots of a version were it was working and the current one. I tested this with the current Internet Explorer and Firefox. It doesn't matter if I use {spaces} or {spaces-list}. The output is the same. It also doesn't matter if I use the macro on the dashboard or a regular page. Depending on the window size and the length of the space descriptions, the icons wrap into two or three rows. I've never seen it in a single row even without space description.
fields.summary: CSS styles of spacesList macro missing

fields.description:
When editing the wiki, if I type "[]" a checkbox appears. If this checkbox appeared in the table cell - it cannot be removed. Backspace does not remove it and ctrl-z does not remove it either. I didn't find a way to get rid of it short of hitting "Cancel" and restarting the edit.

I'm not sure the Confluence version but it's On Demand.
fields.summary: Checkboxes in tables are not removable

fields.description:

Expected behavior:  
Create the page from template and save as child of the "Foo" page where the button is used.
fields.summary: Create from Template macro in no longer create page as child

fields.description:
When editing the contents of a page and then comparing the versions, for some reason any edited content is being marked as if the formatting has been changed even though it has not.

*Steps to reproduce:*

# Create a page, add the content "Version 1" and then save it.
# Edit the page to create a new version, but make sure the only change is to change the content to be "Version 2", (only changing the single character), without changing the formatting.

The results will appear as in the attached 3 screenshots named "Version1", "Version2" and "VersionDiff". However, as no formatting was changed the "VersionDiff" screenshot should only include green highlighting for the changed character but there shouldn't be any blue highlighting as the format was not changed.
fields.summary: Page diffs show formatting changes when no formatting was changed
